thread.title: RDS Advance Notice of Q1 2018 Results Announcement

author: cnbc.com
title: RDS Advance Notice of Q1 2018 Results Announcement
text:
THE HAGUE, Netherlands, March 26, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- On Thursday, April 26 th at 07.00 BST (08.00 CEST and 02.00 EDT) Royal Dutch Shell plc (NYSE: RDS.A) (NYSE: RDS.B) will release its first quarter results and first quarter interim dividend announcement for 2018.
These announcements will be available on http://www.shell.com/investor .
For enquiries please contact:
Shell Media Relations: +44 (0)207 934 5550
Shell Investor Relations: +31 (0)70 377 4540 or +1 832 337 2034
View original content: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/rds-advance-notice-of-q1-2018-results-announcement-300619407.html
SOURCE Royal Dutch Shell plc
